description:
T1. Bay Tree. 8 metres in height. Reduce by 3 metres all round, leaving the tree 6 metres in height. Tree is very overgrown, intruding on car park also blocking a lot of natural sunlight in the residential property of 54 Inner Park Road. Situated on the right hand side of the building just by the carpark area. Situated on the left hand side of the driveway. T2. Laurel Tree. 7 metres in height. Reduce Laurel by 4 metres leaving the tree 3 metres in height. Tree is overhanging residential property and has become very overgrown and blocking a lot of natural sunlight in car park and a little from the rear garden of 54 Inner Park Road. Situated next to the rear garden of 54 Inner Park Road and the block of flats. Situated on the left hand side of the driveway T3. Yew Tree. 7.5 metres in height. 6 metres in width. Trim back by approximately 3 metres leaving the tree 3 metres in width. Tree is overhanging the neighbours property, also causing a lot of fallen debris and blocking natural sunlight. Situated next the 54 Inner park road, on the left hand side of the driveway T4. Yew Tree. 8 metres in height. Reduce by 2.5 metres leaving the tree 5.5 metres in height. Tree has become very overgrown and going over into the neighbours garden, also blocking a lot of natural sunlight. Situated next to T3 on the left hand side of the driveway. T5. Holm Oak Tree. 9 metres in height. Reduce tree by 3 metres, leaving the tree 6 metres in height. Tree has become very overgrown and is hanging over the boundary on 54 Inner Park Road. Also tree is blocking a lot of natural sunlight. Situated next to T4 on the left hand side of the driveway. 

T7. Magnolia Tree. 8 metres in height. Reduce by 3.5 metres leaving the tree 4.5 metres in height. Tree is growing over the roof and causing a lot of noise at night also very overgrown and blocking a lot of natural sunlight. Situated by the garages. T8. Yew Tree. 8 metres in height.
